verses.verse: <S%G4903><s%> But Working Together <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Exhort <S%G3870><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Vain <S%G2756><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> To Receive <S%G1209><s%> You : <S%G5209><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For He Says, <S%G1063><s%> In A Time <S%G2540><s%> Accepted <S%G1184><s%> I Listened To <S%G1873><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Salvation <S%G4991><s%> I Helped <S%G997><s%> Thee : <S%G4671><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> The Time <S%G2540><s%> Well Accepted; <S%G2144><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> The Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Salvation : <S%G4991><s%>

Not One <S%G3367><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Anything <S%G3367><s%> Giving <S%G1325><s%> Offence, <S%G4349><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Blamed <S%G3469><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Service; <S%G1248><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> Commanding <S%G4921><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> Servants, <S%G1249><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> Much, <S%G4183><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Tribulations, <S%G2347><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Necessities, <S%G318><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Straits, <S%G4730><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Pureness, <S%G54><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Long Suffering, <S%G3115><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Kindness, <S%G5544><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Unfeigned, <S%G505><s%>

In The <S%G1722><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of Truth, <S%G225><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Arms <S%G3696><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Left, <S%G710><s%>

Through <S%G1223><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Dishonour, <S%G819><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Evil Report <S%G1426><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Good Report : <S%G2162><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Deceivers, <S%G4108><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> True; <S%G227><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> Being Unknown, <S%G50><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Well Known; <S%G1921><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Dying, <S%G599><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Lo <S%G2400><s%> We Live; <S%G2198><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Disciplined, <S%G3811><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Put To Death; <S%G2289><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> Sorrowful, <S%G3076><s%> <S%G104><s%> But Always <S%G1161><s%> Rejoicing; <S%G5463><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Poor, <S%G4434><s%> <S%G4183><s%> But Many <S%G1161><s%> Enriching; <S%G4148><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Having, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Possessing. <S%G2722><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Our Mouth <S%G2257><s%> Has Been Opened <S%G455><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Corinthians, <S%G2881><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Our Heart <S%G2257><s%> Has Been Expanded. <S%G4115><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> Ye Are Not Straitened <S%G4729><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> <S%G4729><s%> But Ye Are Straitened <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4698><s%> Your Bowels; <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> As Recompense, <S%G489><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> To Children <S%G5043><s%> I Speak, <S%G3004><s%> Be Expanded <S%G4115><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye. <S%G5210><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Be Not <S%G1096><s%> Diversely Yoked <S%G2086><s%> With Unbelievers; <S%G571><s%> <S%G5101><s%> For What <S%G1063><s%> Participation Has <S%G3352><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lawlessness? <S%G458><s%> <S%G5101><s%> And What <S%G1161><s%> Fellowship <S%G2842><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Darkness? <S%G4655><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> And What <S%G1161><s%> Concord <S%G4857><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Belial, <S%G955><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Part <S%G3310><s%> To A Believer <S%G4103><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> An Unbeliever? <S%G571><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> And What <S%G1161><s%> Agreement <S%G4783><s%> A Temple <S%G3485><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Idols? <S%G1497><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> A Temple <S%G3485><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Are The <S%G2075><s%> Living, <S%G2198><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> God, <S%G3754><s%> I Will Dwell <S%G1774><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Walk Among Them; <S%G1704><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Be <S%G2071><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> A People. <S%G2992><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Come Out <S%G1831><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Separated, <S%G873><s%> Says The <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Unclean <S%G169><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Touch Not <S%G680><s%> And I 2504 P-1NS-C Will Receive 1523 V-FDI-1S You; 5209 P-2AP

And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Be <S%G2071><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Father, <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Daughters, <S%G2364><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>
